#summary Rule Function > Id

= id( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match (or partially match) an item's !ArkInventory ID


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to match

== Remarks ==
  * the complete item id can be found on the debug info menu
  * partial matches can made
  * does not work on spells (learnt pets and mounts)

== Examples ==

`id( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 )`

`id( 1, "23:34" )`

`id( "12:1:0:0:0:23", 54 )`
